ConversionUtils

Method Detail

convert

public static <L,R> R convert(Mapper<L,R> mapper,
                              L l)
Delegates the conversion of the specified object to the specified mapper.
This method will wrap any ConversionException that occured during the conversion inside a RuntimeException.

Type Parameters:
L - Type of object being converted.
R - Type of conversion result.
Parameters:
mapper - Mapper doing the conversion.
l - Object being converted.
Returns:
Returns the result of the conversion.
Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException - If it catches ConversionException during the conversion.

mandatoryConvert

public static <L,R> R mandatoryConvert(Mapper<L,R> mapper,
                                       L l)
Delegates the mandatory conversion of the specified object to the specified mapper.
This method will wrap any ConversionException that occured during the conversion inside a RuntimeException. I

Type Parameters:
L - Type of object being converted.
R - Type of conversion result.
Parameters:
mapper - Mapper doing the conversion.
l - Object being converted.
Returns:
Returns the result of the conversion. Never returns null.
Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException - If it catches ConversionException during the conversion.
